txt.en: 'Many prisoners are chained to walls in Orodir. We must break the chains and prevent any more from being enslaved.'
The prison fortress of Naerband has been rounding up anyone and everyone in an effort to enforce a twisted law over the lands.
You have successfully defeated many foes outside the gates of Naerband and destroyed the shackles used to bind their prisoners.
Orodir is located next to Naerband.\n\nYou should destroy shackles and defeat foes in Orodir.
